alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Greene; Polk; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Webster, southwestern Dallas, southern Polk and northern Greene Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Morrisville to near Marshfield. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Springfield... Stockton Lake... Marshfield... Willard... Strafford... Fair Grove... Walnut Grove... Pleasant Hope... Morrisville... Aldrich... Elkland... Sacville... Glidewell... Ebenezer... Bassville... Brighton... Northview... Olive... Cave Springs... Eudora... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 80 and 106. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
